page.title: 06Duffield Squash Club
page.content: In{1936}two players,{Keith Thompson and{Leslie Wolley}felt there was need for a squash club in Derby and settled on Derby and County Lawn Tennis Club. In{1937}No.1 court was built with a kitchen and boiler room and a balcony overlooking the court.Â£1000 was raised from members donating Â£5 each. Duffield Sports Club Ltd. was founded in{1960.}There were{95}full members and 35 restricted members. { Pauline White}the leading lady player was selected to play for Great Britain in 1962.In{1972}court No.2 was built and it still was the only club in Derbyshire.Further land was purchased from the garage next door in{1978}and court Nos.3 and 4 were built,plus a kitchen,dining area and multi-purpose room above.In{1985}the membership had gone up to{844}members.
